name: A Tale or Two
description:
Welcome to The Deep, an abandoned dungeon complex, home to darkness, silence, and an enigmatic figure known only as The Storyteller. Using trinkets you find out in the dungeon, unlock new paths and choices as you create your very own story alongside your fellow prisoner. As you shine light on the unturned stones of The Deep, you may come to learn just what secrets The Storyteller is keeping from you...

This is my first ever uploaded game to itch.io! I've recently started my journey as a game developer and am over the moon to present my first proper project: A Tale or Two! I hope you enjoy the unravelling mysteries that The Deep has to offer...

Thanks so much for stopping by!

Asset References: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BhbfTKIkpy3ZMPXKm32B1_9hDTtPyztr7yzDzg7WVqQ/...
